title: Learned Solution: Sources/Views/Components/CurrencySelectionView.swi...
content:
Error: Sources/Views/Components/CurrencySelectionView.swift:29:13: error: generic struct 'Picker' requires that 'CurrencyRate' conform to 'Hashable'; Sources/Views/Components/CurrencySelectionView.swift:29:13: error: initializer 'init(_:selection:content:)' requires that 'CurrencyRate' conform to 'Hashable'; Sources/Views/Components/CurrencySelectionView.swift:32:26: error: referencing instance method 'tag(_:includeOptional:)' on 'Optional' requires that 'CurrencyRate' conform to 'Hashable'

Solution: Fixed 4 errors using RAG patterns
